Posting a perfect Diwali picture, actor Shahid Kapoor passed on a very important message this Diwali- Spend it with the ones who matter the most.
Of course, he was posing with wifey Mira in the picture.
For celebrities who have regular chaotic schedule hardly spend time with their family and loved ones, and so these festivals become this much-needed break from monotony.
Making our social media timelines happier with their pictures, Bollywood celebrities updated all their fans about their Diwali whereabouts and it proved one fact right-Family comes first.
